import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Progress, Row, Col, Button, Form, FormGroup, FormText, FormFeedback, Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, Label } from 'reactstrap'; import { AppSwitch } from '@coreui/react' import { throws } from 'assert'; class ClusterType extends Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { hdpSwitch: true, hdfSwitch: false, combinedSwitch: false, hdpBorder: 'border-success', hdfBorder: '', combinedBorder: '', hdpHeader: 'text-white bg-success', hdfHeader: '', combinedHeader: '', hdpVersion: 1, hdfVersion: 1, combinedVersion: 1 }; } changeState = (e) => { var eader = ''; var border = ''; if (e.target.id == "HDF") { if (this.state.hdpSwitch == false) { border = 'border-success'; eader = 'text-white bg-success'; } this.setState({ hdpSwitch: false, hdfSwitch: !this.state.hdfSwitch, combinedSwitch: false, hdpBorder: '', hdfBorder: border, combinedBorder: '', hdpHeader: '', hdfHeader: eader, combinedHeader: '', }) } else if (e.target.id == "HDP") { if (this.state.hdpSwitch == false) { border = 'border-success'; eader = 'text-white bg-success'; } this.setState({ hdpSwitch: !this.state.hdpSwitch, hdfSwitch: false, combinedSwitch: false, hdpBorder: border, hdfBorder: '', combinedBorder: '', hdpHeader: eader, hdfHeader: '', combinedHeader: '', }) } else if (e.target.id == "COMBINED") { if (this.state.combinedSwitch == false) { border = 'border-success'; eader = 'text-white bg-success'; } this.setState({ hdpSwitch: false, hdfSwitch: false, combinedSwitch: !this.state.combinedSwitch, hdpBorder: '', hdfBorder: '', combinedBorder: border, hdpHeader: '', hdfHeader: '', combinedHeader: eader, }) } } saveAndContinue = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.nextStep(); } back = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.prevStep(); } render(){ const { values } = this.props return(

Step 1: Choose a cluster type

   25%  

 

Hortonworks Data Platform

Hortonworks Data Platform (HDP) helps enterprises gain insights from structured and unstructured data. It is an open source framework for distributed storage and processing of large, multi-source data sets.

 

Hortonworks Data Flow

Hortonworks DataFlow (HDF) is a scalable, real-time streaming analytics platform that ingests, curates and analyzes data for key insights and immediate actionable intelligence.

 

Combined Cluster

Combined HDP + HDF clusters allow you to leverage the best out of Hortonworks platforms. Manage all your services in one central place and build Edge to AI applications.
) } } export default ClusterType;
